description: Describes the assessment runs that are specified by the ARNs of the assessment runs.

nested_items.name: assessmentRuns
nested_items.description: Information about the assessment run.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the assessment run.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The auto-generated name for the assessment run.

nested_items.name: assessmentTemplateArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the assessment template that is associated with the assessment run.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The state of the assessment run.

nested_items.name: durationInSeconds
nested_items.description: The duration of the assessment run.

nested_items.name: rulesPackageArns
nested_items.description: The rules packages selected for the assessment run.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: userAttributesForFindings
nested_items.description: The user-defined attributes that are assigned to every generated finding.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The attribute key.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value assigned to the attribute key.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time when  StartAssessmentRun was called.

nested_items.name: startedAt
nested_items.description: The time when  StartAssessmentRun was called.

nested_items.name: completedAt
nested_items.description: The assessment run completion time that corresponds to the rules packages evaluation completion time or failure.

nested_items.name: stateChangedAt
nested_items.description: The last time when the assessment run's state changed.

nested_items.name: dataCollected
nested_items.description: A Boolean value (true or false) that specifies whether the process of collecting data from the agents is completed.

nested_items.name: stateChanges
nested_items.description: A list of the assessment run state changes.

nested_items.name: stateChangedAt
nested_items.description: The last time the assessment run state changed.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The assessment run state.

nested_items.name: notifications
nested_items.description: A list of notifications for the event subscriptions. A notification about a particular generated finding is added to this list only once.

nested_items.name: date
nested_items.description: The date of the notification.

nested_items.name: event
nested_items.description: The event for which a notification is sent.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The message included in the notification.

nested_items.name: error
nested_items.description: The Boolean value that specifies whether the notification represents an error.

nested_items.name: snsTopicArn
nested_items.description: The SNS topic to which the SNS notification is sent.

nested_items.name: snsPublishStatusCode
nested_items.description: The status code of the SNS notification.

nested_items.name: findingCounts
nested_items.description: Provides a total count of generated findings per severity.
(string) ---
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: failedItems
nested_items.description: Assessment run details that cannot be described. An error code is provided for each failed item.

nested_items.name: failureCode
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: failureCode
nested_items.description: The status code of a failed item.

nested_items.name: retryable
nested_items.description: Indicates whether you can immediately retry a request for this item for a specified resource.
